full_summary:
# [N95 Pan-Canadian Respiration Distribution](#n95-pan-canadian-respiration-distribution)
## [Titre en Français: Distribution pancanadienne de masques N95](#titre-en-français-distribution-pancanadienne-de-masques-n95)
### Legal Notice

This procurement notice concerns a contract opportunity for the provision of N95 respirators for distribution to vulnerable populations in Canada.

#### Tender Engagement Details:

* Competitive bid reference number: 1000258905
* Publication date: May 7, 2024
* Tender closing date: June 3, 2024 (14:00:00 ET)
* Expected contract start date: June 18, 2024
* Expected contract end date: December 31, 2024

The Government of Canada is seeking a contractor to provide logistical support for the distribution of surplus N95 respirators to vulnerable populations across the country in preparation for the 2024 wildfire season.

Contract Requirements:

* The contractor will be responsible for leveraging their existing operational sites and partner networks to support the distribution of N95 respirators
* Preference will be given to contractors who can demonstrate experience in logistics and distribution, particularly in remote and underserved areas

Evaluation Criteria:

* The contractor's proposal will be evaluated based on the lowest price

Eligibility:

* This tender is open to qualified contractors who are either Canadian or from a country that has a trade agreement with Canada

Submission:

* Contractors must submit their proposals electronically through the Canada Buys procurement portal
* Information regarding the submission process and requirements can be found on the portal

Contact Information:

* Sayed Elias Abedi
* Telephone: 1-343-575-3580
* Email: [sayed.abedi@hc-sc.gc.ca](mailto:sayed.abedi@hc-sc.gc.ca)
* Address: 200 Eglantine Driveway, Tunney's pasture, Ottawa, ON, K1A 0K9

Attachments:

* The contracting entity has attached the complete tender notice document to this announcement. Contractors must review the document carefully and respond accordingly.
